review: Amazing pizza in a very nice chilled atmosphere! Staff are amazing and the homemade brownie was the icing on the cake! Highly recommend!
Maleena serves Amazing food, super quick service and very cheap. Great atmosphere, Would highly recommend visiting.

Sadly we only went here once near the end of our 2 weeks in Arugam Bay but maybe best else we would have eaten ALOT of pizza. They are good and we are pizza snobs, no not up to the standards we're used to at...home but great for Sri Lanka and we've eaten a few on our 2 months here. To top it off though, the salad was great, the staff super friendly/fun and the music good. Sadly they are currently using plastic straws but promised they have ordered metal ones for next season, great ne home but great for Sri Lanka and we've eaten a few on our 2 months here. To top it off though, the salad was great, the staff super friendly/fun and the music good. Sadly they are currently using plastic straws but promised they have ordered metal ones for next season, great news!
Fantastic dining place to have a meal with a group or for couples. Atmosphere is great.live  cooking with pizza oven is just make you hungry.

Great restaurant and great service! They gave us playing cards after dinner so we chill there a bit longer. They don‚Äôt serve alcohol but you can bring it from the place across the street! Very friendly!

Had the Pollo pizza and it was really tasteful! Prices are decent!!  We didn't have to wait for a long time!

Had the diavola pizza and ecologica pasta. Both were top quality! The pasta was cooked al dente and the pizza was delicious. 
The only thing that would make it better would be Parmesan cheese for the pasta, but we are in Sri Lanka not Italy...and the mozzarella works ok as substitute.

We shared Pizza and Pasta and the food was really good. the workers were really nice and professional!
Came in on saturday night and had a Margherita. Fresh ingredients, good atmosphere and great service. Will definitely eat here again.
The pizza was really delicious, they make it thin just like in Italy. The ingredients are fresh. And the vibes in the restaurant are really nice! :-)
Must try this pizza when in town, authentic, delicious, and all round good vibes. Lots of vegetarian options. Friendly staff, right in the middle of town. Dont miss out! :)
